name: RoboBattleBuddies
description:
A 2.5D beat-em-up style game with a focuses on bosses. Beat the bosses to get new abilities to help you in the next fight!

Game made for the Brackey's game jam. This is a re-upload because unfortunately the original uploaded to the jam didn't go up will all the files correctly, but I worked really hard on it so I want people to be able to at least see it.
